result.execSummary:
The defendant Trevor W Olson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Methamphetamine, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Polk County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Must follow all rules of Probation.
Must complete an AODA assessment and comply with recommendations.

miscConds.notes: $290.60 fine/costs to be paid to Probation while on Probation. Failure to pay will be civil judgment.

Must provide DNA sample and pay the $250.00 DNA surcharge to Probation while on Probation. Failure to pay will be civil judgment.   Defendant may request expungement of the DNA sample under Wis. Stat. 165.77(4) by petitioning the Wisconsin Department of Justice. Expungement of DNA is NOT a court process. 
For information see: http://www.doj.state.wi.us/dles/crime-labs/clb-forms.
May not possess or use firearms or body armor.

No contact with individuals without agent's consent **unless deemed appropriate by agent.** No contact with victims **unless deemed appropriate by agent.** 
Absolute Sobriety. 
Cannot vote until civil rights are restored. Cannot hold elective office.   
If not a U.S. Citizen, may face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights.

timeConds.notes:
Subject to work release. Not subject to good time. 3 days sentence credit IF REVOKED.
**Per Court Order on 1/12/2018, the last month of conditional jail time is to be STAYED.**
